name: Real Car Traffic Town Race
description:
Real Car Traffic Town Race! Get the pleasure of racing your dream car with the most stunning interiors, featuring rear view mirrors and windscreen wipers. Beautiful graphics with realistic scenarios will make the game an addictive one for all those who love to drive. Race against time, escape the police or test your reflexive skills!
Features:
-Realistic Driving and Racing
-Amazing car interiors
-Rear view mirrors and windscreen wipers!
-Stunning world scenarios
-Best physics engine with real crashes
-Simple car controls
